resources.string: For learning purposes only, otherwise at your own risk!

"1. This software is designed for learning Android development and will not collect any user data." "It is strictly prohibited to use this software to infringe on others' privacy or for gaming profit. If the software user cannot comply with this regulation, please delete it immediately." "For any adverse consequences such as privacy leakage caused by the user's use of this software, the user shall bear the responsibility, and the software author is not responsible.
" "2. Users shall not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble this software product. Violators constitute infringement and shall bear the adverse consequences.
" "3. The software guarantees no viruses, Trojans, or malicious code that damages user data. However, since this software product can be downloaded and spread through networks, the software author cannot guarantee whether the software downloaded from non-designated sites is infected with computer viruses or contains disguised Trojan horses or hacker software, and assumes no direct or indirect liability for damages.
" "4. The software will be continuously updated to provide users with new features and fix bugs in a timely manner. At the same time, the software author guarantees that this software does not contain any malicious code intended to damage user computer data during the upgrade process.
" "5. Due to the diversity and complexity of user computer hardware and software environments, the functions provided by this software cannot be guaranteed to execute normally or achieve the results expected by users under any circumstances. The software author assumes no responsibility for any consequences arising from the user's use of this software.
" "6. If the user installs this software on their own, it indicates that the user trusts the software author, voluntarily chooses to install this software, and accepts all terms of this agreement. If the user does not accept this agreement, please delete it immediately.
"
